command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE sms_configs;
messages: `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
stdout:
Table	Create Table
sms_configs	CREATE TABLE `sms_configs` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `provider` enum('twilio','vonage','custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'twilio',
  `enabled` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `twilio_account_sid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `twilio_auth_token` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `twilio_from_number` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `vonage_api_key` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `vonage_api_secret` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `vonage_from_number` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `custom_webhook_url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,
  `custom_webhook_method` enum('GET','POST') DEFAULT 'POST',
  `custom_webhook_headers` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `custom_webhook_body_template` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_by` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin
